name: Polling the Nations
description: A compilation of more than 14,000 surveys conducted by over 1000 polling organizations in the United States and 100 other countries from 1986 to the present time. The pollsters included in the database are: U.S. polling organizations (e.g., Harris International, The Pew Center); Universities (e.g., Rice University, University of Maryland); Newspapers (e.g., New York Times, Los Angeles Times); Television news organizations (e.g., CBS, NBS, Fox, CNN); International polling organizations (e.g., Eurobarometer); and special interest groups (e.g., Boy Scouts, AFL-CIO)
